story:
I was born and raised in the mid-west, with a long but interesting detour in New Orleans… and am on my own at a crossroads in life.  I am living with no permanent address and my personal belongings fit inside my suitcase and a backpack.  I spent the past year and a half in Europe.  I am now back in the States, continuing my gypsy ways and preparing to work and teach at Gyeonggi English Village in Paju City, South Korea.

I am raising funds to support this time of transition in my journey and to fill the gap of my basic expenses until I receive my first paycheck in Korea, which is about a month after I arrive.  I will leave for South Korea once I receive my work visa in about 3-6 weeks.

The Beginnings of Gypsy Woman
I bought a ticket to Europe in April of 2011.  I had lost all of my personal belongings to Hurricane Katrina in 2005 and then again in 2010 to a leaky storage unit.  My cat ran away, my car broke down beyond repair, and I had to move. It seemed it was time to take a leap and do something... different.

I traveled first to Germany.  I had a connection through my practice of Reiki, a traditional Japanese healing art, at a Seminar Haus owned and run by Reiki Masters.  I was welcomed there and stayed for an extended visit working in exchange for room and board.  With very little money in my bank account but a desire to extend my time and life lessons in Europe, I discovered the website helpx.net.  Helpx is an online listing of hosts all over the world who invite volunteer helpers to stay with them in exchange for food and accommodation.  Through helpx, I was able to extend and diversify my time in Europe.

Teaching English in South Korea
While traveling in Europe I began to question, what is next? Appreciating the beauty and lessons of travel, I wanted to continue on my journey.  The practicality of life and finances demanded that I explore ways to earn an income.  I began researching positions teaching English as a Second Language and was delighted to find the job listing at the Gyeonggi English Village in South Korea.  With my background in Education and interest in experiential education, I was attracted to their non-traditional and fun style of teaching and camp-like setting.

I took a leap, applied and was offered a position.  I returned to the States about three months ago to begin the long process of acquiring a work visa for South Korea.  That process will be complete in the next 3 - 6 weeks and I will be on my way!

Coming Home to Me
The upheaval and change in my life continues to reinforce that no matter where I am, I can always practice coming home to me - coming home to that which is greater than any house, or set of belongings or location. Not always easy.

I rely on spiritual practices including the Usui Shiki Ryoho tradition of Reiki.  I am a yoga student and participate in the activities and practices of The Art of Living Organization led by Indian Guru Sri Sri Ravi Shankar.  I am also a member of the Buddhist group Soka Gakkai International.  These spiritual practices form the backbone of my life, no matter where I travel. The organizations behind them foster a sense of community and home all over the world.

I have also been challenged, nurtured and supported by the people and programs of Landmark Education, particularly the Wisdom Course and Community.  I was in the Landmark Forum in Houston,Texas the weekend that Hurricane Katrina hit New Orleans.  They are steadfast supporters of "anything is possible" and gave me a platform from which to learn and practice "taking leaps" in the face of uncertainty.

Request for Funding
The lessons and growth of travel have been rich and plenty, but after traveling and living very simply in Europe for a year and half, it is time to “replenish the well.” I am seeking funding to support this time of transition in my journey and fill the gap of my basic expenses until I receive my first paycheck in South Korea, about a month after I arrive.

Here is my budget:

$250  -  For Food/Household products from the States to Bring to South Korea

$300  -  For Shoes/Clothing purchases in the States for a year of working and living in Korea (I am told the largest shoe size in Korea is a 7)

$250 - Vitamins and Personal Items from the States to Bring to South Korea

$350  -  Living Expenses until I depart for South Korea

$150  -  Travel Money for Trip to Korea (airfare is paid by GEV)

$200  -  Emergency Money/Incidental Expenses

$1000  -  Living Expenses for First Month in Korea (as estimated by staff at GEV)

Total funds requested:  $2500

 

Perks

To express my Gratitude to contributors, I am offering distant Reiki treatments.  Reiki is a traditional Japanese healing art and can be offered hands-on in person or sent to a person or situation remotely anywhere in the world.  To learn more about Reiki, visit my blog at www.nancieteresa.wordpress.com/services.  All Reiki treatment perks will be offered within 4 months of the completion of my campaign.

Thank you for considering a contribution to my campaign.  A donation of any size is earnestly appreciated and will be put to good use.  It is also wonderful if you can share this campaign with others who might enjoy and appreciate my journey.

Any contribution is an important link in the continuation of my lessons and travels.  I have grown personally more this past year of travel then I ever could have imaged in my life in the States. Traveling has challenged me to step out of my comfort zone, to engage more in the world, and to be present to what is happening NOW. It has invited me to be open to differences of MANY kinds and has allowed me to feel more confident and at ease with myself... step by step and day by day.

Thanks so much for spending time with me and my campaign and considering supporting the next step in my journey.

To learn more about me and my journey you can visit my blog at www.nancieteresa.wordpress.com

story:
A LIL ABOUT ME

First of all, thank you for checking out my campaign! My hopes and dreams are that the Loving Me series will get funded by YOU so together we can take the books to the next level as well as get as many books into the hands of children in Ghana!!
I am on a mission to help kids realize that bright red hair with tinted freckles, or bleach blond hair with crystal blue eyes, or the darkest hue of chocolaty skin with awesome kinky hair are all the things that make this world a fun and interesting place! There are no mistakes! We are all born unique on purpose!
I embrace differences and I want kids to get excited about who they are today! 
 
 
SPLASH OF INFO ON THE 'LOVING ME SERIES': 
 
The Loving Me Series is told through they eyes of a little girl and boy who discover all the things they love most about themselves! The message of self-love is a Universal one! I love to perform with my team (reading, drumming, dancing, etc) and see the light bulbs go off for little kids who learn how cool it is to be who they are!
 
(view cover on Gallery link in this campaign for boy's book) 

MY OBSTACLE:  

On my way to becoming an independently published success story, unbeknownst to me, my distributor was a misbehaving one, (code for liar and cheat), who accepted my shipment of books, admittedly used the profit from their sales to keep his own company afloat, commented on how effortlessly they sold themselves, and refused to forward me my portion of those sales. 

Needless to say, he has ceased communicating with me. The funds were to be used for the expansion of the  brands (ie. to obtain a patent for a loving me product, the release my new book and to have merchandise available for all the fans & supporters). I don't want this disappointing incident to end my journey, so I'm trying to keep my head above water, but financially, it is quite challenging to do so as a self-published author.

 

HOW YOUR DONATIONS WILL HELP!: 

*Web site re-launch ($1000)

*Send a record number of books to Ghana this Black History Month!

*Completion of the Loving Me theme song and cartoon (started, but hanging in limbo) ($2000)

*Continuing to get books out to underprivileged children (on going)

*E-book conversion ($1200)

*Loving Me merchandise (T-shirts, dolls, you name it or suggest it, etc)($1500+)

*Travel expenses for Book Exposes to drive sales and increase awareness of the books

*Sales/Marketing expenses to build on what I have established thus far, providing product samples, etc. 

*Loving Me App featuring an edu-tainment game ($7500)

*Patent/Production for exciting new Loving Me product for girls ($12000)

*Printing/Publishing/Book design/Illustration/Book Delivery for upcoming launch of my new children's story! ($4500)

Overall, your funds will help generate more business and allow me to grow beyond simply breaking even, but generating real profit for sustainable long term success.

 

 

AWARDS FOR LOVING ME SERIES:

 

2009 PAN ALKEBULAN LIBERATION COMMUNITY AWARD

 

2010 BRAMPTON ARTS ACLAIM AWARD (contacted by Mayor's office)

 

2010 & 2011 BEST SELLING CHILDREN'S BOOK AT 'A DIFFERENT BOOKLIST' BOOKSTORE

 

2011 AFRICAN-CANADIAN KNOWLEDGE AWARDS BEST SELLING CHILDREN'S BOOK

 

2011 AFRICAN-CANADIAN KNOWLEDGE AWARDS BEST SELLING TITLE

 

2011 AFRICAN-CANADIAN KNOWLEDGE AWARDS BEST SELLING AUTHOR

New goal for 2013!

I recently joined forces with a George Brown College Professor's organization called 'Links Across Boarders'. She has been working hard trying to get books into as many children's hands as possible in Ghana! So, for every 2 high five perks that are selected, 1 book will go into the hands of a child in Ghana!

As well, I have added a perk specifically for those who are interested in making a difference this Black History Month. Selecting the Thunderbolt Perk instantly places a book from the Loving Me Series (your choice of the boy/girl version) into a box that will be shipped out at the end of this February 2013 by Links Across Boarders!

MANY PEOPLE ARE NATURAL GIVERS, I'M A GIVER TOO! SO PLEASE CHECK OUT THE PERKS SECTION TO SEE WHAT I TOO, WILL GIVE TO YOU!!

NO MATTER HOW SMALL OR HOW GREAT, IT IS APPRECIATED.

story_txt:
A LIL ABOUT ME
First of all, thank you for checking out my campaign! My hopes and dreams are that the Loving Me series will get funded by YOU so together we can take the books to the next level as well as get as many books into the hands of children in Ghana!! 
I am on a mission to help kids realize that bright red hair with tinted freckles, or bleach blond hair with crystal blue eyes, or the darkest hue of chocolaty skin with awesome kinky hair are all the things that make this world a fun and interesting place! There are no mistakes! We are all born unique on purpose!

I embrace differences and I want kids to get excited about who they are today! 
 
 

SPLASH OF INFO ON THE 'LOVING ME SERIES': 
 
The Loving Me Series is told through they eyes of a little girl and boy who discover all the things they love most about themselves! The message of self-love is a Universal one! I love to perform with my team (reading, drumming, dancing, etc) and see the light bulbs go off for little kids who learn how cool it is to be who they are!
 

(view cover on Gallery link in this campaign for boy's book) 

MY OBSTACLE:  
On my way to becoming an independently published success story, unbeknownst to me, my distributor was a misbehaving one, (code for liar and cheat), who accepted my shipment of books, admittedly used the profit from their sales to keep his own company afloat, commented on how effortlessly they sold themselves, and refused to forward me my portion of those sales. 
Needless to say, he has ceased communicating with me. The funds were to be used for the expansion of the  brands (ie. to obtain a patent for a loving me product, the release my new book and to have merchandise available for all the fans & supporters). I don't want this disappointing incident to end my journey, so I'm trying to keep my head above water, but financially, it is quite challenging to do so as a self-published author.
 
HOW YOUR DONATIONS WILL HELP!: 

*Web site re-launch ($1000)
*Send a record number of books to Ghana this Black History Month!
*Completion of the Loving Me theme song and cartoon (started, but hanging in limbo) ($2000)
*Continuing to get books out to underprivileged children (on going)
*E-book conversion ($1200)
*Loving Me merchandise (T-shirts, dolls, you name it or suggest it, etc)($1500+)
*Travel expenses for Book Exposes to drive sales and increase awareness of the books
*Sales/Marketing expenses to build on what I have established thus far, providing product samples, etc. 
*Loving Me App featuring an edu-tainment game ($7500)
*Patent/Production for exciting new Loving Me product for girls ($12000)
*Printing/Publishing/Book design/Illustration/Book Delivery for upcoming launch of my new children's story! ($4500)
Overall, your funds will help generate more business and allow me to grow beyond simply breaking even, but generating real profit for sustainable long term success.
 
 
AWARDS FOR LOVING ME SERIES:
 
2009 PAN ALKEBULAN LIBERATION COMMUNITY AWARD
 
2010 BRAMPTON ARTS ACLAIM AWARD (contacted by Mayor's office)
 
2010 & 2011 BEST SELLING CHILDREN'S BOOK AT 'A DIFFERENT BOOKLIST' BOOKSTORE
 
2011 AFRICAN-CANADIAN KNOWLEDGE AWARDS BEST SELLING CHILDREN'S BOOK
 
2011 AFRICAN-CANADIAN KNOWLEDGE AWARDS BEST SELLING TITLE
 
2011 AFRICAN-CANADIAN KNOWLEDGE AWARDS BEST SELLING AUTHOR
New goal for 2013!
I recently joined forces with a George Brown College Professor's organization called 'Links Across Boarders'. She has been working hard trying to get books into as many children's hands as possible in Ghana! So, for every 2 high five perks that are selected, 1 book will go into the hands of a child in Ghana!
As well, I have added a perk specifically for those who are interested in making a difference this Black History Month. Selecting the Thunderbolt Perk instantly places a book from the Loving Me Series (your choice of the boy/girl version) into a box that will be shipped out at the end of this February 2013 by Links Across Boarders!

story:
Who We Are

We are moms. We are writers. We write about sick children, cancer, finding love, keeping friendships. We write about women in Congo. We write about vampires. We write about our failures. We share our successes.

We write. We edit. We revise, revise, revise.

And sometimes...we publish.

Why $2,500?

In 2014 Write On Mamas will print its first anthology, Why Mamas Write. Funds raised from this second Indiegogo campaign will cover the costs of copy editing, cover/lay-out design and printing. Literary Mama co-editor Kate Hopper. has guided the anthology's 25 contributors through the editing process and will write the book's forward.  Our final task is to raise the last bit of funding needed to publish the book in 2014! 

Why do our Mamas Write?

from the foreword:

"Why Mamas Write examines the things that drive us to the page both as readers and writers. Some of these women (and one man) write to remember and create permanence, others to heal and transform. Some write to encourage, to make other mamas feel less alone. Others write and read to gain perspective, to understand what they think and believe. 

This book was born from the common denominator that is motherhood, and these pieces tap into the urge to create, an urge that leads many a woman both to the delivery room and the blank page. But these essays are about much more than why mamas write. These writers are grappling with universals: love, acceptance, disappointment, grief."


What's in it for you?

We’ve got perks! Get a signed copy of our book! Get VIP tickets to our book launch party! Make a Play Date and six “Mamas” will read excerpts from Why Mamas Write in your living room. To support our project, click on a perk listed to the right and donate online.  Not comfortable donating online? You can send a donation check to Write on Mamas, 319 Dolan Avenue, Mill Valley, CA 94941. Please specify your perk in the subject line.

Here's the T-Shirt you'll receive at the $125 perk, there's two to choose from:

Watch Us In Action

Take a moment to check out one of our Mamas, Claire Henessey, reading her essay  during Lit Crawl 2013. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Help spread the word about Write on Mamas anthology project. Like us on Facebook, mention us on Twitter, your blog, email our Indiegogo page to friends and family, word of mouth.  Then tell us about it so we can return the favor!

Live in SF/Bay Area?

Are you a writing mom, too? Stop by one of our monthly “Scribbles & Sips” where we write, share, and glean advice from a special guest. Prepare to be inspired!

story:
Some Background: 

The Oakland Poetry Slam was founded in 1999 by a small group of Bay Area writers committed to bringing poetry to the sunny side of The Bay. In that very first year the rookie team Oakland reached Finals at The National Poetry Slam (NPS), ultimately finishing the tournament as the 4th ranked team in the nation. After the squad's triumphant return, the Slam took off and took on a life of it's own! Here we are, more than a decade later and Oakland hasn't missed a Nationals yet.

The Impact: 

Oakland gets a bad rap, a terrible rap actually. If you'd never been here and only listened to national news outlets, you'd think this was a horrible cesspool of drug addled gang-bangers and crack babies. As residents we know better; we know "the Town" is a vibrant hotbed of creativity and continually on the cultural cutting edge. Oakland is a shining jewl, it's an international mecca of people, food, languages, culture and art. It's a city brimming with artists, entertainers and people of all types. Sure, we have our share of issues - what city doesn't? 

As residents we feel it imperative that Oakland's voice be heard by the widest possible audience. That's why we need YOU to help! Without generous patrons of the arts like yourself there is simply no way that we'd be able to get the team to Boston and back to show the rest of the nation what Oakland has to offer. We have a fabulous team of poets this year; it would be an absolute travesty for us to not be able to make the trip because of money.

What We Need: 

All told it'll take about $5,000 to register for Nationals, fly the team to Boston and house them while there. We'll also be self-publishing a collection of poetry and creating a DVD featuring performances from team members to aid in fundraising. If we need to take hitchhike and crash on another team's floor while we're in Boston we will. Hopefully though we'll meet our goal. Either way %100 of your donation will go to the expenses listed here. If we somehow manage to surpass our goal, the surplus will  be divided among the team to be used as a per-diem while in MA.

What You Get:

YES - We have PERKS for you! A small donation will get you a chapbook with a (handwritten) poem from each team member and both coaches OR a chapbook from one of the team members. If you're able to be slightly more generous you'll recieve a copy of the DVD mentioned above, the team chapbook and one from each team member. If you're straight ballin and can afford a larger donation, in addition to all the items above we'll give you 2 lifetime passes to all our shows AND arrange a special feature performance by the team just for you!

Other Ways You Can Help:

Tell you friends and help us spread the word! We're on facebook, youtube, myspace, twitter and pretty much everyplace else you can think of online - check us out. If you know someone who's a fan of poetry (or comedy, theater and live performance in general) point them in our direction and earn a little good karma.

story:
I am known as that author gal and friend, Kristin Groulx (pronounced groo).  For the past many years, I have successfully created my own business and published five books under my own small press company of The Tenth Muse Books.  Working on the sixth book to complete the series has been a wonderful release of creativity and I love the energy already put into it... but I'm at a fork in the path. 


I almost let it go.  Almost.  It takes so much out of me to create the books, as well as everything associated with it.  But it's hard to stop doing something you love, and are passionate about, and knowing especially that it helps others.

It has not been without its challenges, including creating time while also raising a family and three children, as well as recovering from a disabilitating disease called necrotizing fasciitis which appeared in 2009 during writing of my third book.  It nearly claimed my left arm and has taken years to rehabilitate into good health.  However, I have not been able to work during this time and creativity is there, but other things are not... the thing that makes this type of independent project go... funding.

For the first several books, I also donated 10% of my book sales to the charity Kids Help Phone, which went to provide someone at the other end of the phone or internet for kids who may be in trouble.  Part of the topics I write about in my book series (aside from the paranormal) are difficult teen topics others would not dare to attempt.  But I have had many teens confide in me with some of their problems and life for them is still challenging, more so than it was years ago.  I want to create books that they are also passionate about!  I want to build a world inside of the series that they can relate to and open their minds to new and fantastical possibilities!  I love the artwork and poetry done by others, that has come back to me, inspired by my series.  I have featured many poems and artwork in and on the covers of the books.  It's not just my dream being fulfilled, but countless others. 

I also give talks to teens about writing and the process it takes to become an author.  I would like to further get my book series into the library system and give book readings and talks to teens in the libraries as well.

 

 

Many goals.  One dream.  A heart filled with inspiration.

 

Some of the costs incurred for an author and publisher include:

  • Clip art and graphics royalties (paying artists for their work)
  • Graphics programs for editing and creating book covers and inside artwork
  • Word programs & Adobe Pro (required to create the book covers)
  • Fonts
  • Marketing materials such as postcards and business cards
  • Proofs - books created prior to the final print to check for spacing, page layout, editing errors, etc.  Each book typically has 2-3 proofs come to me before I send the final print.
  • Uploading fees - to print the book, there are fees associated with the uploads and formatting to create the book and have it printed on quality paper
  • a working Computer, Printer and office space - I work on a very old computer and it threatens to crash repeatedly - it's time for an updated one
  • Insurance
  • Webdesign and hosting
  • Table fees for book fairs and events
  • and sometimes the events themselves, such as the Haunted Book Parties - reserving the space, entertainers, food, etc.

 

Lend a hand.  Support a good cause.  Make the dream a reality.

Many who know me know that I have often been very generous, donating books, bartering books.  It's just who I am.  I see someone who wants to read, but can't pay, and I often want to lend them a hand.  It's good karma.  It's reciprocal.  I do believe that what energy we do put out often comes back to us. 

I would love to be able to give back to those who contribute to my campaign.  I've created special 'perks' that will encourage as well as help you to create this dream into a reality.  One special perk includes letting me write a character for you.  I've done it in the past.  It can be quite fun finding yourself in a book!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this great campaign!  How exciting to know an author and especially one that wants to encourage teens to read and write their own journeys!
  • Share this on Facebook.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

A little more about me:

Author Kristin Groulx writes paranormal young adult romances, chick-lit and paranormal thrillers. With a flare for the mysterious, a fascination with magic, and a passion for discovering love in its many forms, Kristin knew it was only natural to write fiction. She is also no stranger to traveling, having lived and explored the United States, Asia and Canada.

Her real life ghostly encounters are incorporated into her novels, and present a direct look at uncommon paranormal experiences. For the past decade, Kristin has dug up extensive genealogical research, ranging from tiptoeing around cemeteries and rummaging betwixt pages of census records. Her direct lineage includes several writers, journalists and editors, and perhaps even a few cauldron-brewing witches. But that last part we’ll let you decide.

Her latest adventure in writing is perfect for a teen audience of ages 13-18. The Alyson Bell series deals with some pretty dark topics, and although set in a magical setting, readers will have no trouble identifying personal situations they can relate to.

story:
Why Nudibranch?

Named for their exposed (nude) lungs, Nudibranch are famous for their amazing variety of colours and interesting sex lives.  With over 3000 known species, and new ones being found all the time, there must be a Nudi for you!

I started diving 4 years ago and immediately fell in love with all the thrills, the fish, the reefs, and occasionally a little hidden treasure: 1-5cm brightly coloured nudibranch.  My goal is to document the fantastic world of Nudibranch through a graphic book full of nudibranch fun facts and photos.

                                        

Did you know?

  • New! Do you know at what depth these creatures live?  While most live in relatively shallow reef systems, they have been found living anywhere from the intertidal zone (a few feet), to 2500m (8200 feet).
  • New!  Did you know that nudibranch can steal toxins? Some nudibranch steal the toxins of prey which they absorb and store in their Cerata which then makes them poisonous to future predators!
  • Did you know Nudibranch are hermaphroditic? They contain male and female organs to maximize breeding opportunities when they meet (it's a big ocean for a slug)!  They then cross fertilize and each lay eggs!
  • Did you know Nudibranch are born with a shell?  Similar to other gastropods (such as snails and moluscs), Nudibranch have a shell during their larvae stage. As they grow they shed the shell and as the body turns (process known as torsion), their body lands on their foot, leaving all the organs up top!
  • Did you know some Nudibranch are solar powered?  Phyllodesmium longicirrum eats plants, absorbing their chloroplasts and their ability to perform photosynthesis!
  • Nudibranch only live a very short time (making seeing them all the more special)? Most live only a few weeks to months, although some larger species such as the Spanish Dancer Nudibranch can live up to a year.
  • Nedibranch colour is a self defence mechanism? Some are coloured to blend in with local habitat, wheras others have evolved to mimic poisonous animals.
  • The nudibranch horns are actually called Rhinophores? These Rhinophores are used for smell, wheras the plume on the back is  its lungs!
  • Nudibranch colour is partly determined by diet? Nudibranch are carnivorous animals eating anything they can get their foot on (yes they have a foot!). The Blue Dragon Nudibranch’s favorite meal is the venomous Portuguese man-of-war jellyfish!
  • Nudibranch breed based upon smell? To attract a mate, nudibranch leave a scent trail to be followed by potential mates… but they have to be careful, it’s also how predatory species track them as prey

    

Above: A nudibranch has caught the scent! Two Nudibranch seen off the coast of Mozambique caught “tailgating” – part of the mating ritual.


Branching Out: Why the book on Nudibranch

I'm a passionate scuba diver and love "Branching"; finding and photographing Nudibranch. I want to take this to the next level!


                                      


Nudibranch are an essential part of the marine ecosystem with numerous potential benefits to science currently being studied.  The intent of this book is to spread awareness and promote the notion that even the smallest ocean creatures can be of immense interest.

The scope of this project is to make a marketable 40 – 60 page graphic book in the pop-art style. This book will be ideal as a coffee-table conversation starter or as a fun e-book to take on the go.

My previous publishing experience includes the writing of financial and human resource management chapters for a manual published by the United Nations; as well as an applied thesis highlighting the potential use of endowment funds to augment funding for provincial parks. 


Places we will be diving / Searching for nudibranch over the next year!

  • Okinawa Japan,
  • Komodo National Park Indonesia,
  • Bali / Gili T Indonesia,
  • Raja Ampat or Lembeh/Bunnaken Indonesia,
  • Sipadan / Mabul Malaysia, 
  • Similian Islands Thailand, 
  • Melbourne Harbour Australia, 
  • Great Barrier Reef Australia, 
  • Pigeon Island Sri Lanka, 
  • TBD - Make a suggestion!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


What your generosity will go towards

                       

Your generous contribution will be used to make this book a reality and produce an initial printing. Funding will go towards the following aspects:

  • Compilation of artwork,
  • Purchase of graphic design software,
  • Consultation with a Montreal based graphic artist regarding layout / end product design,  
  • Consultation with a Halifax based brand manager regarding marketing to publishers,
  • Initial run of photograph prints,
  • Initial printing.

                                            

And now the fun part, the perks!!!

For any contribution you choose to make, I am extremely grateful.  Thank you very much for your consideration to help make this project a success!

  • For $10, Three prints from the collection,
  • For $20, That mentioned above, plus a copy of the e-book,
  • For $35, That mentioned above plus a handmade one-of-a-kind Nudibranch figurine,
  • For $50, That mentioned above plus a copy of the book once published,
  • For $100, That mentioned above plus special mention within the book.

                               


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, please share the campaign!!!

Email the link, post it to a friend / contacts wall, tweet it!  Share it with anyone you can!

  • Do you know a diver? 
  • Do you know a dive shop? 
  • Do you know someone who loves animals / the ocean?

Your help is extremely appreciated and will be key to making this book a success!  Lets get the book trending and see what we can make together!

story:
My name is Hannah Haddadi and I have something to say. 

I am a Denver based Poet, who is ready to expose her soul to the world. I go to school for integrative medicine, counseling, and above all - healing. There are many different ways in which the body, soul, and heart heal. There are also many different ways in which this healing can be ignited or inspired. This campaign is extremely important to me because I have found for myself that speaking my truth ignites the healing that I need. I am ready to share this piece of myself with others, in hopes that they find what supports their own being. 

What I Need & What You Get

I have recorded enough poems to make an EP at this point however, I need some help to keep the momentum of this project going and in so, to be able to finish it whole-heartedly.

I spent a weekend up at the beautiful Evergroove studio in Evergreen, where I was honored to be able to work with Brad Smalling. Surrounded by wise trees, I felt supported by mother nature herself and look forward to finishing the album again in this environment.

Contributors will help support the mixing and mastering of the album, website startup, as well as gaining the support and collaboration with fellow local musicians to record alongside my poetry; those of Tom Hagerman, Julie Stratton, and Gina Massaro of Amphibian. I am honored to get the chance to work with such talented musicians and people who I respect dearly,

At this point, the album will be able via internet media avenues however if enough money is raised, my dream of creating physical copies could become a reality. Funds raised will go directly to the final mixing and mastering costs of the album, and anything left over will be transferred to physical production costs.

Those who are gracious enough to donate to my cause and my dream will not only be able to see this project unfold beautifully, but also receive perks! Donor perks will be specific to the amount donated, however these include personalized post cards, free downloads of the album, and personalized 'thank you' bundles!

The Impact

We all are trying to figure out how we can make a difference in this world. For me, soliciting and encouraging healing of all different types is what I strive to do. It is a learning process however, I believe that we are all capable of healing and that our bodies and our beings have an innate healing capacity of their own. Creating poetry and putting myself and my work out into the world is as much of a healing modality for myself inside as it is to the external world. 

Working on this project has made me feel empowered, vulnerable, and a little bit crazy! It is important for myself to put my words out into the universe and with no regrets. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't necessarily donate that doesn't mean that you cannot help my cause! You can still help by sharing my dream and campaign with others! 

You can also help by simply doing whatever it is that you need to ignite and support your own healing. This is turn helps not only your own self but the world.   

Thank you for stopping by and taking the time to read about my dream!

Love, Hannah.

story:
What is FreezeRay Press?

  One year ago, we launched FreezeRay, an online poetry journal dedicated to the intersection of literature and pop culture.  We made the name a difficult compound word with weird capitalization.   One year and four online issues later, the response from both readers and contributors was greater than we could have hoped for.

Welcome to the launch of the newest poetry publisher, FreezeRay Press.   We're keeping the FreezeRay name because our press is basically the journal on paper (and maybe if we're ambitious, we'll put out a Best Of The Journal...on paper).   Our books will have a pop culture focus and a whole lot of great poetry.

What we're doing here is unveiling our entire line-up of titles for 2015 and allowing you to pre-order as many or as few as you like.   These authors and editors were hand-picked to give you a sense of the aesthetic we love at FreezeRay, poets and writers who embrace pop culture with a critical eye and a fan's heart.

In addition to amazing chapbooks by Dalton Day, Ellyn Touchette, Stephen Meads, and Laura Swearingen-Steadwell, we're also publishing a number of collections and anthologies covering the entire spectrum of pop culture.  Hanif Abdurraqib's AGAIN I WAIT FOR THIS TO PULL APART is a poetry anthology dedicated to pop musicians and the pull they have on our lives.  The editorial staff of Black Nerd Problems will be collecting the best of their website's editorials and thinkpieces.  The intersection of video games and literature will be explored by the editors of Cartridge Lit.And the end of the year will be asking for your submissions to a Horror-Ku anthology and an anthology inspired by science fiction flicks, LIT CAME FROM OUTER SPACE (edited by Alan Passman and Rob Sturma).

For what we're calling "Season One", each first printing of these books will come with an exclusive collectible trading card based on the subject matter presented.  We'd love for you to collect them all.

There will be a regular release schedule during 2015 so we can properly promote and give each release time to breathe before we hit you with another blast of pop goodness.

And of course, we're offering discounts for Season One subscriptions, or package deals so you can grab a number of titles that you want for less.

We'd love to spread the nerd gospel far and wide, and as a side goal, get these books into hands of people who never realized that pop culture and literature could be so simpatico.  Help us get launched, and we'll put these words out into the world!


The Transparency Part of The Pitch

What we're breaking down here are the costs of our first three releases and the annual expenses to be a fully functioning independent publishing house.  Printing costs include paying our cover artists because artists should never work for free.

PRINTING COSTS:

Again I Wait printing - 1200

Fake Knife printing  - 500

Book of Gene Printing - 500

Trading cards  300


SUBSCRIPTIONS

Office 150 yr

Submittable 120 year

Adobe 25 year

Domain Name 40 year

Pro Site (includes fully operational store) 300 year


OTHER STUFF THAT'S IMPORTANT

10 ISBNs 250

Stamps.com 200 year

ULine mailers 5 cases  120

printer (for postage) 200

mailing supplies  (postage/special orders) 200

All money we make after recouping expenses will go right back into printing the remainder of the books we have planned for the year.   And what YOU get, besides the warm glow of being a patron, are some incredibly smart, emotional, and poignant books that will make you a better person and a better nerd.


Why We Can Make This Work

As editor-in-chief of FreezeRay, I've been laying the successful groundwork for getting people excited about the marriage of poetry and pop culture, but even before that, I've had success with the zombie poetry anthology Aim For The Head and more recently, the superhero poetry anthology MultiVerse (both on Write Bloody Publishing).   There is an audience out there for this kind of literature, both within and out of the literary circles, and we are determined to keep these voices heard.   All the journals, anthologies, self-publishing, and working with other presses have culminated into where I am now, and this is a project that's in the zeitgeist and ready to be seen.  I love my nerds and nerd culture too much to back away now.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word about this project and signal boost any time you see one of our authors or editors posting about their books.

Our website (with pages devoted to each release, and a store coming soon once the campaign is closed) is here:  FreezeRay Press

Our Facebook page is here:  FreezeRay Press on FB

Our Twitter Account:  FRP on Twitter

If you don't get a chance to pre-order (though we hope you do), our first priority after the campaign closes is to have the books available for order/pre-order on our website to order at your leisure.  Please reblog and retweet and give our authors the shine they deserve.

Okay, enough yakkin'.  Let's get literate!

Bref résumé

L'objectif est simplement de financer d'ici vendredi le 10 avril 2015 les tracts que l'Assemblée constituante provisoire du Québec veut distribuer lors de la  marche pour le climat à Québec le 11 avril 2015. Nous aimerions en financer jusqu'à 5000.

 Le coût est de 0.09$ par tract couleur en papier ou de 0.20$ par tract en carton glacé.  Notre premier objectif est de faire au moins 4000 tracts en papier soit un coût total avec les frais de financement du site Indiegogo, de 375$.

Cependant, le montant minimum pour ouvrir un projet sur ce site est de 500$.

Un rapport des dépenses ainsi qu'un compte rendu de la journée et de la distribution vous seront fournis après l'événement via la page de consultation de l'assemble provisoire du Québec.

Cependant, si nous obtenons pas la totalité de ce montant, nous imprimerons le nombre de tracts correspondant au montant obtenu.

Merci de votre générosité de la part de l'équipe de l'Assemblée constituante provisoire du Québec!

story:
Rövid összefoglaló

A könyv ötlete nem saját. A naplóm olvasói javasolták, és meglepetésemre a Minerva Kiadó elvállalta annak megjelentetését. A rossz hír az, hogy ehhez némi tőke is kell. 

Miről is szól ez a napló?

Ritkán örül az ember egy rákról szóló diagnózisnak, így 37 évesen én sem csapkodtam a térdem a vastagbélrákról szóló lelettel a kezemben. De mikor erről írtam, mások egészen jól mulattak. És nem (csak) a káröröm miatt. Jött a felkészülés, a kemoterápia, sugárkezelés és persze a szike sem maradt szárazon. Én pedig leírtam mindent. Majd azon kaptam magam, hogy egész sokan kezdték követni a történetem, izgulni és persze nevetni a nyámnyila mivoltomon, vagy éppen a groteszk helyzeteken, És persze jöttek a kérdések is: mik voltak az első tünetek? Hogyan vettem észre? Mit szedtem és mit nem? Mire számítson az, aki éppen csak kézbe vette a rákról szóló diagnózist?

A kiadásra váró könyv erre a naplóra épül és azoknak szól, akik saját maguk vagy éppen egy rokonuk, ismerősük miatt hasonló helyzetbe kerültek és próbálnak némi első kézből származó információhoz jutni. És nem bánják, ha közben esetleg nevetni is tudnak.

    Mi kell ehhez és miért jó ez neked?

    • Meglepő módon pénz kell hozzá. 1000 példány kiadásához körülbelül 7-800.000 forint.  Ebből még 600.000 forint hiányzik.
      UPDATE: a kiadás megvalósításához hozzájárul a Katand-ARG Magyarország Kft. is, így a fenti célösszegnél biztosan kevesebb kell.
      UPDATE 2: a Reálszisztéma Dabasi Nyomda Zrt. is csatlakozott az ügyhöz.
    • És miért is jó ez annak, aki támogatja ezt? Nos, például hozzájárulhat a hazai egészségügy felvirágoztatásához, ugyanis úgy döntöttem, hogy a könyveladásból befolyó teljes profitot annak a két kórháznak ajánlom fel, ahol engem is szervizeltek. (Margit Kórház, SOTE Kútvölgyi Tömb)
    • Segíthetsz még több embert ráébreszteni arra, hogy a rák nem feltétlen jelent kizárólag rosszat.

    Kockázat

    Mi lesz, ha nem sikerül kiadni a könyvet?
    • Nagy valószínűséggel semmi. A bolygó eddig is jól elforgott a saját tengelye körül, talán könyv nélkül is így lesz. És még az adókat sem kell emelni a könyv hiánya miatt!
    • Mi lesz az összegyűjtött pénzzel, ha nem lesz könyv? Természetesen a teljes összeg az említett két kórházhoz kerül.

    Miként segíthetsz még?

    • Ajánld figyelmébe barátaidnak, ismerőseidnek ezt a kampányt.
    • Ne feledd az Indiegogo saját megosztási eszközeit.
    • Nem ezen múlik, de akár drukkolhatsz is.

    Ugye milyen szép is az élet? Tedd még szebbé ezzel a könyvvel!

    Elkezdtem olvasni a blogod az elejétől, egyrészt nagyon szimpatikus a pozitív hozzáállásod, másrészt jókat nevetek a humoros írásokon!
    Úgy hiszem, ez sokat segíthet, a lélek tuti visszahat a test dolgaira.” – Saaby

    „…Úgyhogy hasznos a blog!! Ennél több is: egyik karácsonyi ajándékként kinyomtattam és összefűztem neki (édesanya - a szerk.) az addigi bejegyzéseidet. Talán morbid ajándék, de a blogod stílusa megmutat egy kevésbé szokványos hozzáállási lehetőséget (mármint ehhez a betegséghez és a kórházazáshoz).” – Vörösduma

    „Szia Misi! Kicsit szégyellem magam, de vonyítva nevettem írásodon.” – Gabi59

    „A mai napom a blogod olvasásával telik, egészen az elejétől elkezdtem és folytatom is. Csodálatra méltó a stílusod, és a felfogásod…” – Koky

    „Ebben a percben értem az utolsó bejegyzés végére. Egy lendülettel olvastam végig az elsőtől az utolsóig.
    Kívánom neked, hogy ebben a szellemben folytasd tovább, és épségben, egészségben töltsd a családoddal az elkövetkező 50-60-70 évet!” - L0mpos

    „Szia Altezza!

    Ma reggel találtam a blogodra, és azóta egy ceruzát nem tettem keresztbe, a telefonálókat igyekszem gyorsan lerázni (ami egy ügyfélszolgálaton nem a legjobb..) Régen nevettem ennyit, fantasztikus a humorérzéked! Eszedbe ne jusson abbahagyni az írást, mert itt már többen függőek leszünk és az elvonás súlyos tünetekkel fog járni....” – barnaszemű

    Az alábbi igen nyilvánvaló okból: Nem vagy unalmas! ;)
    Remekül szórakozunk itt jópáran a soraidon.
    Ezt melyik cölöb mondhatja el magáról?
    Segítek: Egyik sem!
    Amúgy Stand-up-osnak elmehetnél..” – Csibész315
story_txt:
Rövid összefoglaló
 A könyv ötlete nem saját. A naplóm olvasói javasolták, és meglepetésemre a Minerva Kiadó elvállalta annak megjelentetését. A rossz hír az, hogy ehhez némi tőke is kell. 

Miről is szól ez a napló?


Ritkán örül az ember egy rákról szóló diagnózisnak, így 37 évesen én sem
 csapkodtam a térdem a vastagbélrákról szóló lelettel a kezemben. De mikor erről írtam, mások egészen jól mulattak. És nem (csak) a káröröm miatt. Jött a felkészülés, a kemoterápia, sugárkezelés és persze a szike sem maradt szárazon. Én pedig leírtam mindent. Majd azon kaptam magam, hogy egész sokan kezdték követni a történetem, izgulni és persze nevetni a nyámnyila mivoltomon, vagy éppen a groteszk helyzeteken, És persze jöttek a kérdések is: mik voltak az első tünetek? Hogyan vettem észre? Mit szedtem és mit nem? Mire számítson az, aki éppen csak kézbe vette a rákról szóló diagnózist?
A kiadásra váró könyv erre a naplóra épül és azoknak szól, akik saját maguk vagy éppen egy rokonuk, ismerősük miatt hasonló helyzetbe kerültek és próbálnak némi első kézből származó információhoz jutni. És nem bánják, ha közben esetleg nevetni is tudnak.    Mi kell ehhez és miért jó ez neked?
  Meglepő módon pénz kell hozzá. 1000 példány kiadásához körülbelül 7-800.000 forint.  Ebből még 600.000 forint hiányzik. UPDATE: a kiadás megvalósításához hozzájárul a Katand-ARG Magyarország Kft. is, így a fenti célösszegnél biztosan kevesebb kell. UPDATE 2: a Reálszisztéma Dabasi Nyomda Zrt. is csatlakozott az ügyhöz.
 És miért is jó ez annak, aki támogatja ezt? Nos, például hozzájárulhat a hazai egészségügy felvirágoztatásához, ugyanis úgy döntöttem, hogy a könyveladásból befolyó teljes profitot annak a két kórháznak ajánlom fel, ahol engem is szervizeltek. (Margit Kórház, SOTE Kútvölgyi Tömb)

story:
This is the short version...

Divorced Mamma of two sporty teenagers meets Divorced Pappa of two adorable little girls and they discover that they have a lot in common!

They fall in love and realize that everything they ever wanted was within reach. Family is everything to Michelle (a Reflexologist) and Dvir (freelance Translator) . Not only do they get along really well, but their four children ranging from 4 to 14 yrs old get along really well, it all just clicks and they are VERY happy.

Living almost 100 kms apart makes meeting up difficult and they both dream of having a real family. This drive to create a loving home and be the best parents they can be is what gives seed to the dream of moving to a house in the country, closer to Dvir's young girls so that he can spend as much time with them as possible.

A happy home with a room for each child to grow and develop the way they deserve is what they are aiming to achieve. They've found the perfect house for rent in Pardes Hana and now all they need is some help to cover all these extra expenses - and there are many: bills need to be paid, deposit (rent on "new" house) , Movers and so many things that they need to get including furniture, school books and uniforms etc.

Soon the new school year will begin and thus the urgency to get everyone settled in before September.

This family has very limited financial means, mainly due to overcoming the challenges of divorce and resulting long drawn out legal battles. Your help to cover all of these extra expenses AND within the time frame needed before the new school year can make it all possible and will mean so much to them!

It's all about healing the past and making a fresh start, stronger and more resourceful TOGETHER.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you really would like to contribute, but cant, there might be other ways you could help:

  • Help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign by sharing on facebook or other social media
  • maybe you have a truck or van we could borrow to help us move items from Modiin to Pardes Hana.
  • Boxes, meals, couch or even dining room table that we could use.
Part of the problem is that Dvir's van broke down so we hope there will be some money left over from our move to buy a small car we could use to collect and return Dvir's daughters from Katzir - twice a week and every second weekend - bussing it there and back with two little ones is a challenge as you can imagine.

All that's left to say is THANK YOU for your contribution, from the bottom of our hearts <3<3<3<3<3<3

story:
Folk skal avgjøre valget - ikke NRK

NRK vil utestenge Rødt fra nasjonal valgomat og partilederdebatter. Men du kan hjelpe oss. Med annonsering i sosiale medier vil vi nå ut til like mange som vi taper ved å utestenges av NRK. 



Takk!

Tusen takk for all støtte så langt. Mange har kontaktet oss og spurt hvordan de kan bidra når NRK behandler oss slik. Derfor har vi startet crowdfunding-kampanje, hvor du kan hjelpe oss å nå ut gjennom sosiale medier.

Pengene tilbake om NRK ombestemmer seg

Kampanjen varer til 1. august. Om NRK har ombestemt seg innen da, kan du velge å få pengene tilbake. Om de ikke har ombestemt seg, bruker vi pengene på å lage en filmsnutt om Rødts politikk og spre den i sosiale medier.

Hva skjedde egentlig?

Allerede i februar ba vi som jobber i Rødt om et møte for å få avklart hvilke kriterier de la til grunn for partilederdebatter og annen valgdekning. Det ble utsatt i flere runder, og 2. juni hadde vi endelig møte med dem. I forkant ba vi også om å få tilsendt kriteriene skriftlig. Det fikk vi ikke, de sa de ville vente og forklare dem muntlig på møtet.


Uklar begrunnelse

På møtet oppga NRK følgende kriterium: Man må være stortingsparti. Vi spurte: Men det er jo lokalvalg? 
De sa: Ja, men det har vi bestemt. Og denne debatten mellom partilederne er ikke så farlig, siden det er lokale saker og kandidater som avgjør. 
Vi sa: Nettopp fordi det er et lokalvalg er det vel litt rart å ha krav om å være stortingsparti? 
De svarte: Det kan du si, men hvis dere går opp på målingene inn mot valgdagen kan det være dere får være med likevel.
Vi sa: Så det er ikke krav om å være stortingsparti likevel?
De svarte: Jo, på en måte, men må ha målinger som gjør det sannsynlig å komme inn.
Vi sa: Så hva må vi ha som månedlig snitt de siste månedene før valget for å få være med?
De sa: Det kan vi ikke gi noe tall på nå. Kanskje seinere. Kanskje aldri. 
Og omtrent sånn gikk det rundt og rundt.

Hva betyr utestengelsen for Rødt?

Det betyr to ting: 
1. Bjørnar Moxnes får ikke delta i partilederdebattene på NRK som åpner og avslutter valgkampen.
2. Rødt blir "usynlige" i valgomaten. Valgomaten funker slik: Først svarer du på 15 påstander om nasjonal politikk. Ut fra svarene får du vite hvilket parti du er mest enig med. Her vil ikke NRK la deg få vite det hvis du er mest enig med Rødt.

Deretter kan du velge å gå videre til en lokal del, med 5 spørsmål som handler om saker i din kommune. Når du har svart på de 5 lokale spørsmålene, kan Rødt dukke opp som partiet du er mest enig i.

Det betyr at Rødt mister muligheten til å nå ut i partilederdebatten (600 000 seere) og i valgomaten (800 000 brukere). 


Hva betyr utestengelsen for Norge? 

Det betyr at de som allerede er inne i varmen slipper å bli utfordra av nye tanker og andre politikere. Det betyr at den politiske eliten trekker opp stigen etter seg. Avstanden mellom den jevne nordmann og den politiske eliten er allerede økende. Vi har alle sett hvordan politiske ledere gjemmer seg bak pr-rådgivere, prøver å holde informasjon hemmelig og at politikere nekter å møte andre enn politikere "på sitt eget nivå" til debatt. Det er denne ukulturen NRK bidrar til når vi blir utestengt.


Hvorfor 10.000 dollar?

For 10.000 USD (litt over 70.000 kr) kan vi via sosiale medier nå ut til like mange som vi mister når NRK utestenger oss. Beløpet er i dollar fordi Indiegogo ikke lar oss samle inn i norske kroner. 


Hva går pengene til?

Pengene skal brukes på å produsere og spre valgtalen NRK hindrer oss å vise: En filmsnutt på ca 1 min. hvor Bjørnar Moxnes forteller om Rødts politikk. 

Hvis vi når målet om 10.000 USD, går 96 prosent til å produsere film og spre i sosiale medier. Fire prosent går til Indiegogo. Hvis målet ikke nås, tar Indiegogo ni prosent. Det gjør de for å motivere til å sette realistiske mål og jobbe hardt for å nå målet sitt. 

Dersom NRK snur innen 1. august og alle giverne ønsker pengene tilbake vil Rødt betale gebyret til Indiegogo. Ingen risikerer å ikke få penger tilbake på grunn av gebyret.

For å få penger tilbake dersom NRK snur må du ha kontoutskrift eller annen dokumentasjon på donasjonen. 

Hva kan gå galt?

Hvis vi ikke når innsamlingsmålet, vil det bli vanskeligere for oss å produsere en god valgtale-film. Det blir også vanskeligere å rette opp for at vi utestenges fra NRK.
Men vi vil uansett bruke pengene på å spre Rødts politikk i sosiale medier, så hver eneste krone som gis vil være nyttig. 


Hva er Rødt? 

Har du lurt på det helt fram til nå? Uffda. Kort fortalt: Vi er utfordreren i norsk politikk. Stadig flere melder seg inn i hos oss, for å stå sammen for rettferdighet og mot kapitalisme.  Les mer på http://rødt.no.

Vi vil skape et vendepunkt

Rødts hovedsak i valget er forskjells-Norge. Vårt mål er at årets valg skal bli et vendepunkt: Gang på gang har velgerne bedt de andre partiene minske de økonomiske forskjellene. Likevel har de økt. Bryr de seg, egentlig? For vi kan jo snu utviklinga om vi vil. Rødt vil gripe den muligheten. 

Les mer om vår politikk mot forskjells-Norge på http://rødt.no. 


Andre måter å bidra på

Vil du gi en pengegave til Rødt som ikke er øremerket? Se http://rødt.no/støtte

Meld deg inn: www.rødt.no/innmelding

Vårt mål er at årets valg skal bli et vendepunkt: Gang på gang har velgerne bedt de andre partiene minske de økonomiske forskjellene. Likevel har de økt. Bryr de seg, egentlig? For vi kan jo snu utviklinga om vi vil. Rødt vil gripe den muligheten. 
    Les mer om vår politikk mot forskjells-Norge på http://rødt.no.
